ingredients: 8 oz. (about 2 cups) baby bella (crimini) mushrooms, chopped small
8 oz. (about 2 cups) baby bella (crimini) mushrooms, chopped small
1 large bunch kale, removed from tough stalks, washed well and dried, chopped
2- 26 ounce jars of your favorite marinara sauce

12 ounces mozzarella cheese, grated (about 2 ½ cups)
